attributes.action: Captain Tom Moor should receive a Knighthood for services to charity!!!
attributes.additional_details: Captain Tom Moor, a WW2 veteran and hero, has managed to raise over £5 million, for the NHS, by walking lengths of his garden even though he has recently had a hip replacement.
attributes.background: Captain Tom Moor, World War 2 veteran and Hero, should receive a Knighthood.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
